conversation.message: Could you please provide more details? What exactly isn’t working?
the thing I tried to fix with that code we saw earlier
Can you clarify which code you're referring to or what issue you're facing?
you know, the thing that broke yesterday. It still doesn’t run.
Unfortunately, I need a bit more context. Could you share the code snippet or error message?
I already told you this yesterday, why do I have to repeat?
I'm sorry, I don’t have memory of past sessions. If you could provide the code or a description, I can help you.
